value.heading: Growth begins with how your people work
value.body: When teams communicate clearly and managers lead well, work moves faster, morale rises, and turnover drops. I make that happen—without the buzzwords.

bullets.title: Fix people problems
bullets.body: Communication, leadership, and ways‑of‑working issues diagnosed and solved.

bullets.title: Fast, practical change
bullets.body: Workshops and coaching that create habits, not just slides.

project.title: Project — The Coach Call
project.desc: 3 months · findings report · one Action Sprint · leadership readout · 90‑day plan

retainer.title: Retainer — Ongoing Partner
retainer.desc: Monthly pulse 1:1s · quarterly reviews · bundled coaching/training hours · priority support
